channel.title: Please look at this and try to help me! rep+
channel.description:
hey guys, so what i want to do is make my own minigame but what i want to do is someone to tell me how can i make it so that if you kill a goblin you receiver for example woodcutting xp? so here is what i mean you kill a goblin and you get 1k wc xp.. is that possible?
Please can someone tell me

item.title: Please look at this and try to help me! rep+
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Bobby Mr. Bobby
item.description:
@Mr_Bobby wrote:

i would say find out how slayer on ure server is set up and model something after that would probably be easiest.

Read full topic
